name: Suenio
description:
Suenio is an arcade side-scrolling puzzle game developed in a 48 hours gamejam.

Help Suenio to reach the end of the level with the help of a magic wand. Bewitch objects from the environment and resolve his path to the bed.

Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move the wand around the screen.
  • [ Z ]: Use of the magic wand.
  • [ X ]: Start over from the last checkpoint.

This game was developed in 48 hours by

- JOYCOT Entertaiment, Alejandro Pérez García [Code & Director]

- Markanime Studios, Marco Antonio Palacios Vázquez [Art]

- Moises9000yt, Moises Rodriguez [Musician]
